catDescription: Explore our collection of men's pants, which range from stylish jeans to comfortable chinos, all designed to provide both fashion and functionality.

items.name: Zippered Cargo Jeans
items.description: Slim fit jeans. Five pockets. Flap patch pockets at legs. Washed effect. Adjustable zippered hem. Front zip and button closure.

items.name: Utility Pocket Jeans
items.description: Relaxed fit pants. Front pockets and back patch pockets. Multi-functional pockets at legs. Loop at hem. Washed effect. Front zip and button closure.

items.name: Baggy Fit Jeans
items.description: Baggy jeans. Five pockets. Washed effect. Front zip and button closure.

items.name: Chino Pants
items.description: Skinny fit pants made of stretchy cotton blend fabric. Front pockets and back welt pockets. Front zip and button closure.

catDescription: Discover our range of men's shirts, perfect for any occasion, offering a variety of styles from casual tees to smart polos.

items.name: Cotton Knit Shirt
items.description: Cotton knit T-shirt. Round neck and short sleeves.

items.name: Heavyweight Shirt
items.description: Roomy T-shirt made of dense cotton. Round neck and short sleeves.

items.name: Brushed Rib Shirt
items.description: Relaxed fit T-shirt made of cotton with lightly brushed finish. Round neck and long sleeves.

items.name: Knit Polo Shirt
items.description: Knit polo shirt in viscose blend fabric. Lapel collar with front button closure. Short sleeves. Rib trim.

catDescription: Stay warm and stylish with our collection of men's hoodies and sweatshirts, crafted for comfort and durability.

items.name: Dense Sweatshirt
items.description: Full cut sweatshirt with wide rib collar and short sleeves.

items.name: Hoodie Sweatshirt
items.description: Hoodie sweatshirt made of cotton with brushed interior. Collar with adjustable hood and long sleeves. Front pouch pocket. Rib trim.

items.name: Hoodie Sweatshirt
items.description: Cropped hoodie sweatshirt. Long sleeves with rib cuffs. Washed effect

items.name: Hoodie Sweatshirt
items.description: High collar sweatshirt with front zip closure. Long sleeves. Rib trim.
